original_text: I am not strong enough to hope for my life to become any better. There is no reason for me to continue my life. I am not strong enough to hope for my life to become any better. There is no reason for me to continue my life. I am not strong enough to hope for my life to become any better.
korean_text: 내가 무슨 기력이 있기에 기다리겠느냐 내 마지막이 어떠하겠기에 그저 참겠느냐

sentences.original_text: to hope for my life to become any better
sentences.korean_translation: 내 삶이 더 나아지기를 바랄 힘이 없습니다
